Desc.entry: Works with other partners to bring about the regeneration of the area. Co-ordinates the Darnall Festival (carnival and youth event) annually in August. Provides employment support and advice as well as lifelong learning, such as lifeskills, basic maths, english and IT. The Forum runs the local Post Office (the first in a UK city to be run by a charity) which is now located in the Forum building. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 03644311.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-5pm (office times); Mon-Thurs 9am-5pm (drop-in for advice & IT); monthly (Management Committee); quarterly (public meeting/events)

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
